ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] minotaur horn change?
ygData.msgSnippet: Interesting thing: A few weeks ago my daughter was playing her druid on Vallen Zek. She ran into a 41st lvl enchanter who was kind enough to buff her and tell
ygData.messageBody:
Interesting thing:

A few weeks ago my daughter was playing her druid on
Vallen Zek. She ran into a 41st lvl enchanter who was
kind enough to buff her and tell her to seek out the
no drop items because PKs can't loot them. He carried
very little equipment with him ... just enough to get
by.



--- "Kimes, Dean W." <dean_kimes@...>
wrote:
> with no drop option unavailable on pvp servers I
> assume?
>
> Kit
>
> Just say NO to pop-up boxes :)
>
> If they implement this the way it should go is:
> Drop, Confirm, No Drop.
> If set to Drop everything behaves the way it does
> now.
> If set to Confirm you get the annoying confirmation
> box.
> If set to No Drop your items act as No Drop items.
>
